about_the_game:
Asra Diwal is a masterful evader who steers clear of all responsibility, but problems always turn out to be much faster than she is. In an effort to secure an easy and carefree life as Inspector Hor's servant, she is unwittingly forced to carry out an investigation and save her own life.

The city of Devas is full of dark wonders and mysterious creatures, and its past is eager to bring back memories of itself. But as you push forward in the relentless search for secrets, you may stumble upon a spark of love! And pass it by.

Features:

  • A story where your choices matter

  • Three romantic interests with their own secrets for you to uncover. Or you could leave them alone and deal with your own problems instead

  • A mystical tale set in the world of the distant future where humans are not the only sapient beings around

  • Eight endings (and a few silly deaths)

The city of Devas is full of dark wonders and mysterious creatures, and its past is eager to bring back memories of itself. But as you push forward in the relentless search for secrets, you may stumble upon a spark of love! And pass it by.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0

name: SIGILLVM: RESONANCE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: The Long Night is close at hand. The city comes to a standstill in the lead up to the festivities. But a series of strange events forces Asra to seek out the truth she doesn't truly wish to know, and to come face-to-face to those she has long since left behind.
